title: Image Problem
subtitle: Rumors claimed lawyers for Tashfeen Malik (and an MSNBC host) discouraged publishing images of her face because doing so was offensive to Muslims.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A lawyer for Tashfeen Malik asked the media not to show photographs of her face because doing so was offensive to Muslims, and MSNBC host Melissa Harris-Perry criticized the New York Times for publishing such pictures.
